General.Name: Zhejiang Dibay Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: ZHEJIANG DIBAY ELECTRIC CO.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, manufacture, and sale of sealed motors for household and commercial compressors in China. The company offers refrigerator compressor motors and air conditioner compressor motors, as well as DC inverters. It also research, develops, distributes, and sells silicon steel for frequency motor drive controllers. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Shengzhou, China.
